title: Back!
author: JGray
text:
I know. A week late. I apologize and we're now back on track. I apologize for the delay and hope you all can forgive me. I assure you, it was entirely the fault of the writer and not the artist.

Welcome to chapter four! Is that Theresa up there? Putting on makeup? Plucking her eyebrows? Wearing jewelry? Have we entered a strange, alternate dimension? Keep reading and find out!

In the meanwhile, I did some updating to the site. A banner has been added for Tiffany Munroe's Between Places. Tiffany did the very cool, ten page 'Questions' series that ran between chapter three and four.

Speaking of that series, I moved it to the extras section. I also moved the fillers Gennifer did over the last few months to our art galleries.

Enjoy!
